quest.name: Fire and Brimstone
journal: Brimstone has blocked Broenruht out of Blind Iron Mines.
Digging stoppages may endanger the miners' livelihoods, but a surfeit of sulphurous gas endangers their very lives. Only clear earth crystals can plug the gas plumes and decontaminate the shafts.
The clear earth crystals worked like a charm on the gas plumes. Let Broenruht know that the mines are no longer brimming with brimstone.

The demand for ore has risen sharply due to rebuilding efforts in the wake of the Calamity. Many miners would not think twice about risking their health for the healthy profits in store, but owing to your deeds, none will have to.
objectives: Use clear earth crystals on the gas plumes.

dialogue.name: BROENRUHT
dialogue.text: Well, this time we've dug ourselves into a hole well and truly!

dialogue.name: BROENRUHT
dialogue.text: Struck brimstone while shoveling through the mines, and now the rocks are rife with the reek of rotten eggs. The gas grew to be too much to bear.

dialogue.name: BROENRUHT
dialogue.text: You'll need this clear earth crystal if you're to restore the earth and plug the leak properly.

dialogue.name: BROENRUHT
dialogue.text: Just mind the syrphid clouds brought on by the brimstone.

dialogue.name: BROENRUHT
dialogue.text: Now that's a breath of fresh air!

dialogue.name: BROENRUHT
dialogue.text: For many of the miners, a bit of brimstone is nothing to write home about, but I'm the one who has to write the letters when the gluttons choke to death down there.

dialogue.name: BROENRUHT
dialogue.text: The prices metals command in the wake of the Calamity will make us either rich or dead.
